title: What is Alive-Counter in the automotive industry? - Quora

response.answer_text: As we know in automotive ,LIN and CAN communication are used to communicate between ECUs. Alive counter is used to detect failure mode called “frozen frame” in End to End communication on LIN and CAN . An Alive Counter is incremented at every transmission request; the value checked at the receiver side if it changes at all, but correct incrementation is not checked. This only allows detecting a frozen frame.
